name: Squ(where?)
description:
This is a submission to the Wowie 2.0 jam! All assets (gameplay, music, visuals etc...) were made within the 72 hours!

In this game you find yourself on a seemingly impossible puzzle, how do you complete it, is there a secret way round? You must tackle this problem and use it to our advantage in the following puzzles...

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS

Download the zip file and unzip, then double click squ(where) windows - Wowie 2.0 - v1!

FIRST LEVEL WALKTHROUGH

Only read this if you are stuck... 

Fall off of the edge of the platform and land on the top, similar solve but sideways in level 2...
